pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2

sentences.english: We must work hard to forget that I love to search for you.
sentences.chinese: 要多努力才能忘記讓我愛到深入骨髓的你。

sentences.english: Methods Bone Marrow Micronuclei (BMM) assay in mice was used.
sentences.chinese: 方法小鼠骨髓微核試驗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the management of pyogenic osteomyelitis of the spine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脊柱化膿性骨髓炎的手術治療方法。

sentences.english: His breasts are full of milk, and his bones are moistened with marrow.
sentences.chinese: 他的奶桶充滿，他的骨髓滋潤。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of acute leukemic bone marrow stroma in leukemia development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討白血病骨髓基質對白血病形成的作用機制。

sentences.english: Results Many BMSCs of rats were gained from the euhure in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 結果體外培養獲得大量的大鼠骨髓基質幹細胞。

sentences.english: Peripheral neuropathy also occurs with demyelization and degeneration of the axis cylinder .
sentences.chinese: 隨着骨髓的樞椎管的再生作用也產生末梢神經病。

sentences.english: Minute fragments from cells of bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 從骨髓細胞斷裂的微小碎片。

sentences.english: One of the bone-marrow samples went into the Black Hawk.
sentences.chinese: 一份骨髓樣本放在黑鷹上。

sentences.english: What do the blood and marrow tests show?
sentences.chinese: 我的血液和骨髓的檢驗單說明了什麼？

sentences.english: The bone marrow of the chimerism mice was grafted into the host mice.
sentences.chinese: 最後將該嵌合體小鼠的骨髓移植到宿主體內。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of megakaryocytes and marrow aspirate in diagnosing aplastic anemia.
sentences.chinese: 核細胞數量及骨髓像在再障診斷中的變化。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether fetal bone marrow stromal cells have hemang ioblastic characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骨髓基質中是否具有血液血管幹細胞的特徵。

sentences.english: Beauty is only skin-deep but ugly goes to the bone.
sentences.chinese: 美貌只是一層皮，而醜陋會深入骨髓。

sentences.english: He felt a bone-deep ache in his phantom fingers.
sentences.chinese: 從幻影手指上，傳來陣陣深及骨髓的痛。

sentences.english: I am on the bone marrow register.
sentences.chinese: 我是個骨髓捐獻的在冊人員。

definition: (usually of sth intangible) to seep into/to permeate
in the depth of one's soul
